title: Rise in expected inflation shifts SRPC right

content.question: An increase in the expected inflation rate will cause the

choices.label: short-run Phillips curve to shift to the left
short-run Phillips curve to shift to the right
long-run Phillips curve to shift to the left
long-run Phillips curve to shift to the right
actual inflation rate to fall below the expected inflation rate

content.answer: short-run Phillips curve to shift to the right

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
